column2: rt_plot <- ggplot(data = new, mapping = aes(x = date,
title = "Current Rt Estimates for South Africa",
subtitle = "This chart displays the latest reproduction estimates for South Africa. \nSee the *Behind the Scenes* section below for methods and further explanation")+
plot.title = element_text(face = "bold", size = rel(1.5), hjust = 0.0, colour = "white"),
